teams.bio: Sitting Commissioner. Passionate builder of league metrics, propaganda, and morale.
The Silent One.  Although quiet, constantly lurking in the shadows of the waiver wire.
Former regime leader. Eternal rival of Democracy. Still insists the Dark Ages were misunderstood.
The purest form of incompetence. Perpetually underperforming.
The Coalition of Frauds. Big mouths, smaller results.
Bob Downey - Boom or bust performances, constant disappointment.
The Prodigy they call him - although the big moment seems to be too big
The Eternal Threat. Always in the mix despite quiet demeanor.
The Wild Card. Constantly rotating rosters, to little avail.
The Chief Extraterrestrial Officer. The public's watching eye, they say.
The Big Choke. Regular season warrior, terrified of the big game.
The Volatile Girth. Truly never know what you will get.
